title: Authorizes vocational education and extension boards to permit students who receive home instruction to participate in vocational education courses
summary: Authorizes vocational education and extension boards to permit students who receive home instruction to participate in vocational education courses when requested by parent or guardian who resides in the county.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          185

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen. MAZIARZ -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Education

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing vocational
         education and extension boards to permit  students  who  receive  home
         instruction to participate in vocational education courses

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 1102 of the education law is amended  by  adding  a
    2  new subdivision 16 to read as follows:
    3    16. IT SHALL PROVIDE VOCATIONAL EDUCATION COURSES TO STUDENTS RESIDING
    4  IN  THE  COUNTY  WHO  RECEIVE  HOME  INSTRUCTION,  AT THE REQUEST OF THE
    5  PARENT, GUARDIAN OR PERSONS HAVING  CUSTODY  OF  SUCH  STUDENT.  SUCH  A
    6  REQUEST SHALL BE FILED WITH THE VOCATIONAL EDUCATION AND EXTENSION BOARD
    7  OF  THE  COUNTY  IN WHICH THE PARENT, GUARDIAN OR PERSONS LEGALLY HAVING
    8  CUSTODY OF THE PUPIL RESIDES ON OR BEFORE THE FIRST DAY OF JUNE  PRECED-
    9  ING THE SCHOOL YEAR FOR WHICH THE REQUEST IS MADE.
   10    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD00815-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing vocational education and extension boards to permit students who receive home instruction to participate in vocational education courses
